Row.Text: Diplomatic Victory Points
World Congress has awarded you {1_Value} Diplomatic Victory Points.
Volcano Becomes Active
{1_VolcanoName} is now active. It could erupt at any time.
Volcano Becomes Dormant
{1_VolcanoName} is now dormant. There is no longer any danger of it erupting.
Gentle Volcanic Eruption

{1_VolcanoName} has erupted. Thankfully damage appears to be light ({2_Tiles} {2_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {3_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {4_Units} {4_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {5_Yields} {5_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility).
Catastrophic Volcanic Eruption

{1_VolcanoName} has erupted. Damage in the area is severe ({2_Tiles} {2_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {3_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {4_Units} {4_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {5_Yields} {5_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility).
Megacolossal Volcano Erupts!

{1_VolcanoName} has erupted in one of the deadliest explosions known to mankind ({2_Tiles} {2_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {3_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {4_Units} {4_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {5_Yields} {5_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility).
River Floods

The river {1_RiverName} has flooded. Thankfully damage appears to be light ({2_Tiles} {2_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {3_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {4_Units} {4_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {5_Yields} {5_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility).
Major River Flooding

The {1_RiverName} has flooded. Damage in the area is severe ({2_Tiles} {2_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {3_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {4_Units} {4_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {5_Yields} {5_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility).
Record-Setting River Flooding

The {1_RiverName} has flooded and devastated the area as never seen before ({2_Tiles} {2_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {3_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {4_Units} {4_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {5_Yields} {5_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility).
River Flooding Prevented

The heavy rains along the {1_RiverName} could have been a major problem. Thankfully {LOC_GRAMMAR_A_AN << {2_BuildingOrDistrict}} {2_BuildingOrDistrict: plural 1?was; other?were;} in place to control the rising waters. ({3_Yields} {3_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)
Violent Storm!

A {1_StormType} named {2_StormName} has developed and is headed to the {3_Direction}. The storm will cause destruction over the next two turns. (With its arrival there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

A {1_StormType} named {2_StormName} has developed and is headed to the {3_Direction}. The storm will cause destruction over the next two turns. (With its arrival there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)
Storm Rages On

The {1_StormType} named {2_StormName} continues its movement and is now headed to the {3_Direction}. (During this turn there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

The {1_StormType} named {2_StormName} continues its movement and is now headed to the {3_Direction}. (During this turn there were {4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {6_Units} {6_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {7_Yields} {7_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)
Storm Peters Out

The {1_StormType} named {2_StormName}, now weaker, has made its final move across the map. (During this turn there were {3_Tiles} {3_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {4_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {5_Units} {5_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {6_Yields} {6_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} gained fertility)

The {1_StormType} named {2_StormName}, now weaker, has made its final move across the map. (During this turn there were {3_Tiles} {3_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {4_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, {5_Units} {5_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed, {6_Yields} {6_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)
Drought!

A {1_DroughtType} has struck. Named the {2_DroughtName} Drought, this severe lack of rainfall can damage improvements and will curb [ICON_Food] Food output for the next {3_Duration} turns. ({4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged)

A {1_DroughtType} has struck. Named the {2_DroughtName} Drought, this severe lack of rainfall can damage improvements and will curb [ICON_Food] Food output for the next {3_Duration} turns. ({4_Tiles} {4_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} damaged, {5_Yields} {5_Yields: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} lost fertility)
Welcome Rainfall
At last rain has arrived to alleviate the suffering from the {1_DroughtType}. Already our crops are recovering and the {2_DroughtName} Drought is now a footnote in the historical record.
Crisis Averted
The {1_RandomEvent} was avoided by {2_civName}, preventing damage to their civilization.
Permanent Coastal Flooding
The sea level has risen. All coastal lowland tiles marked as '{1_Name}' have been permanently flooded.
Coastal Tiles Lost
The sea level has risen further. All coastal lowland tiles marked as '{1_Name}' have been submerged and lost to the sea.
{1_Summary}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_LongDescription}
City Unpowered

Buildings or Projects in {1_CityName} can be enhanced by {2_PowerRequired} [ICON_Power]Power, but the city only has {3_PowerAvailable}. They will be less effective until [ICON_Power]Power is restored.
Nuclear Disarmament
Due to the actions of the World Congress, you have been forced to decommission your nuclear arsenal.
Nuclear Weapon Equalization
Due to the actions of the World Congress, your nuclear weapons arsenal has been increased to match that of other civilizations.
Arms Reduction
Due to the actions of the World Congress, you have been forced to reduce your nuclear weapons arsenal to match that of other civilizations.
Success Breaching Dam
Your agent {1_unitName} succeeded in breaching the Dam in the city of {2_cityName}.
Enemy Spy Breached Dam
An enemy Spy succeeded in breaching the Dam in the city of {1_cityName}.
Radioactive Steam Venting!

A Nuclear Power Plant in {1_CityName} has suffered a malfunction and was forced to vent a small amount of radioactive steam to avoid a major catastrophe. (During this turn there were {2_Tiles} {2_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} affected, {3_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, and {4_Units} {4_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed.)
Radiation Leak!

A Nuclear Power Plant in {1_CityName} has suffered a major failure causing a crack in the reactor. A large amount of radioactivity has been released into the surrounding area. (During this turn there were {2_Tiles} {2_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} affected, {3_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, and {4_Units} {4_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed.)
Nuclear Meltdown!

A Nuclear Power Plant in {1_CityName} has suffered a catastrophic failure causing a a total reactor meltdown. A lethal amount of radioactivity has been released into the surrounding area. (During this turn there were {2_Tiles} {2_Tiles: plural 1?tile; other?tiles;} affected, {3_Pop} [ICON_CITIZEN] population lost, and {4_Units} {4_Units: plural 1?unit; other?units;} killed.)
The promise made to you by the {1_CivName} to {2_PromiseType} has been broken (100 [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances generated).
Your promise to the {1_CivName} to {2_PromiseType} has been broken (100 [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances generated).
Additional Grievances Against Opponent
You asked for a promise from the {1_CivName} to {2_PromiseType} and they declined. In fact, they have continued to do this, adding 25 additional [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances against them.
Additional Grievances Against You
The {1_CivName} asked you for a promise to {2_PromiseType} and you declined. In fact, you have continued to do this, adding 25 additional [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances against you.
World Congress is about to Meet
Someone has called for a Special Session of the World Congress. Please choose what you wish to discuss (if anything) at this session. It will begin at the end of this turn.
World Congress is about to Meet
Someone has called for a Special Session of the World Congress. It will begin at the end of this turn.
Discussions Available for Proposal
It is now possible for you to call a Special Session of the World Congress.
New Discussion Available for Proposal
Due to recent world events, you now have new concerns to bring to the World Congress' attention in a Special Session.
Grievances Against You
The {1_DeclaringCivName} has declared war against the {2_TargetCivName}, one of your friends or allies. You now have {3_NumGrievances} new [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances against them.
Your City Liberated
Your citizens in {1_CityName} rejoice at their liberation. They are rejoining your empire thanks to this magnanimous act courtesy of {2_LiberatingLeader}.
Scored Competition Begun
According to the decision of the World Congress, a {1_CompetitionName} Scored Competition has begun.
To assist {1_CivName} in their time of need, an Aid Request Scored Competition has begun.
Scored Competition Completed
The {1_CompetitionName} Scored Competition has come to an end. Rewards have been awarded to those who participated.
Aid Received
{1_PlayerName} has sent you {2_Amount} [ICON_Gold] Gold as Aid.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_LEADER_UPPER << {1_leader}} Censors Rock Music
{LOC_GRAMMAR_LEADER_UPPER << {1_leader}} {1_leader: plural 1?is; other?are;} now prohibiting rock concerts. Your Rock Bands inside their empire have been displaced to a tile just outside their lands.
